###### Who WE ARE

###### We are a leading compliance advisory and regtech solution provider with
a wealth of experience helping FinTechs and financial services meet their
compliance, anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer challenges
(KYC).  
The business environment is continuously evolving with tighter regulations,
while compliance turns digital. We strive to understand your needs , share our
expertise and deliver only the best  solutions to satisfy all your
requirements.

###### Learn more

###### What we DO

###### Our platform connects companies with top Next-Gen Compliance Subject
Matter Experts (SMEs) and top-tier RegTech solutions to cover the full
spectrum of compliance risk in multiple jurisdictions.  
  
We give access to the best SMEs in the industry on matters intersecting
Regulatory Compliance, AML, KYC, FinTech Compliance, RegTech, Blockchain and
Cryptocurrencies.  


###### Learn more

###### How we Help

###### Our holistic approach to risk will help you be safe and overcome
reputational risk and fines by customizing solutions, combining automated
technologies and analytical expertise tailored to your specific needs.  
  
With  Compliance-as a -Service (CaaS) , you will gain access to our trusted
experts  while having the flexibility to adjust  to your compliance  project
needs and technology initiatives  as you go.

###### Learn more

Pricing

## COMPLIANCE AS A SERVICE (CaaS)

Book a Demo

What is it?

​

At UGR , we understand that compliance can be complex and time-consuming, and
non-compliance can result in hefty fines and reputational damage. That's why
we've developed Compliance-as-a-Service, a comprehensive and customizable
solution that takes the burden of compliance off your shoulders, so you can
focus on growing your business.



Compliance As a Service (CaaS) is a monthly consulting subscription plan that
allows you to plan, prioritize, and execute against strategic compliance
projects and technology initiatives without having to permanently increase the
size of your team or get budget approval for large lump-sum projects.

​

​

How does Compliance as a Service work?

​

With Compliance-as-a-Service (CaaS), our team of experienced compliance
professionals will work closely with your organization to assess your current
compliance status, identify potential gaps, and create a tailored compliance
program that aligns with your unique business needs. Our service includes
regular monitoring and updates to ensure that your organization stays
compliant with the latest regulatory requirements, saving you time and effort
in keeping up with the ever-changing compliance landscape.

You will be able be working with the finest industry experts with proven and
succesful experience helping  a variety of Financial Institutions, FinTechs
and RegTech companies, Digital Banks, Blockchain, DeFi, Payment Processors,
Digital Assets, Crypto, and Web3 businesses, including all digital start-ups.

​

This innovative approach to compliance consulting services allows you the
flexibility to adjust the skills on your team as priorities shift within your
organization or new project needs arise.

Simply select a plan that fits your budget, and we’ll help you and your team
work through your ongoing needs. We can also customize a specific plan working
to your specific needs.



 Compliance-as-a-Service (CaaS) Benefits :



  1. Peace of mind: Our team of experts will handle all aspects of compliance, so you can focus on your core business activities with confidence, knowing that your compliance obligations are being met.

  2. Customized solutions: We understand that every organization has unique compliance requirements. Our Compliance-as-a-Service is fully customizable to align with your specific industry, size, and location, ensuring that you get tailored compliance solutions that meet your needs.

  3. Proactive compliance management: Our team will proactively monitor changes in regulations and provide timely updates to keep your organization compliant with the latest requirements, reducing the risk of fines and penalties.

  4. Cost-effective: Compliance-as-a-Service eliminates the need for hiring and training in-house compliance personnel, saving you on overhead costs and time while getting access to expert compliance knowledge. Hiring full time compliance staff takes sometimes up to 6 months and an investment of 15-30% of the right candidate's first-year salary to find them.

  5. Enhanced reputation: Maintaining compliance is crucial for building and maintaining a positive reputation in the industry. Compliance-as-a-Service helps you demonstrate your commitment to compliance, which can enhance your reputation with customers, partners, and stakeholders. 

​

From building to scaling, UGR has the right plan for you.

​
